questions.question: She didn’t realize that she was making a mistake.
questions.description: Clauses connected by subordinating conjunctions or relative pronouns form complex sentences.

questions.question: Where have you been all this while?
questions.description: A sentence that has just one finite verb is a simple sentence.

questions.question: She said that she wanted to go.

questions.question: Rahul is not only clever but also industrious.
